articles.author: Caitlin Yilek
articles.title: Family of American prisoner moved to house in arrest in Iran "incredibly nervous about what happens next" - CBS News
articles.description: The move of four imprisoned Americans to house arrest was the first step in a politically charged agreement that would bring five Americans home from Iran.
articles.content: Washington — The family of Emad Shargi, who has been imprisoned in Iran for more than five years, is holding their breath as highly sensitive negotiations to bring home five Americans held in Iran pl… [+3183 chars]
